meanings.definition: Composed of, involving, or representing various races.
meanings.sent1: The school celebrated its diverse student body by hosting a multiracial cultural fair.
meanings.sent2: The multiracial family proudly displayed flags from each of their ancestral countries.
meanings.sent3: The rainbow cake looked multiracial with its layers of different colored frosting.
meanings.sent4: Her music playlist was a multiracial mix of genres, from pop to reggae.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a multiracial display of flowers, showcasing a variety of colors and shapes.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to people of several or many races.
meanings.sent1: The multiracial community center welcomed individuals from all backgrounds.
meanings.sent2: She felt a strong connection to her multiracial heritage, embracing all parts of her identity.
meanings.sent3: The multiracial soccer team had players with diverse skills and playing styles.
meanings.sent4: The city's skyline was a multiracial tapestry of buildings from different architectural eras.
meanings.sent5: His wardrobe was a multiracial collection of clothing styles, reflecting his global travels.
